Detailed Description

A Model represented by a set of counters.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CModel::CModel ( std::istream &  is)

Constructor.

Parameters
isThe 'ifstream' containting the data representing the CModel to load. (can either be compressed or uncompressed)
CModel::CModel ( std::string  name,
unsigned int  nX,
unsigned int  nU,
int  iniState,
const std::vector< double > &  N_,
RewardType  rType,
const std::vector< double > &  R,
const std::vector< double > &  V 
)

Constructor.

Parameters
nameThe name of this MDP.
nXThe number of states.
nUThe number of actions.
iniStateThe initial state (-1: drawn randomly)
N_The counters matrix. (size: nX * nU * nX)
rTypeThe type of rewards.
RThe list of rewards means. (size: nX * nU * nX)
VThe list of rewards variances. (size: nX * nU * nX or 0; if 0: no variance).
